official-title.#text:
To further the mission of the Global Justice Information
		  Sharing Initiative Advisory Committee by continuing its development of policy
		  recommendations and technical solutions on information sharing and
		  interoperability, and enhancing its pursuit of benefits and cost savings for
		  local, State, tribal, and Federal justice agencies.
